title: Wally Rivers
text: Wally Rivers (24 April 1922 – 6 June 1998) was a South African <a href="cycle%20sport">cyclist</a>. He competed in the <a href="Cycling%20at%20the%201948%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20individual%20road%20race">individual</a> and <a href="Cycling%20at%20the%201948%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20team%20road%20race">team road race</a> events at the <a href="1948%20Summer%20Olympics">1948 Summer Olympics</a>.
